==================

==================

 * add `yield generatorFunction` support
 * add `yield generator` support
 * add nested join support

==================

 * add passing of arguments

==================

 * fix join() of zero thunks

1.2.0 / 2013-06-08 
==================

 * add array yielding support. great suggestion by @domenic

==================

 * add promise support
